trans-unit.source: Provides an API to construct <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref>s that invoke spatial realted canonical EDM functions, and, where appropriate, allows that API to be accessed as extension methods on the expression type itself.
trans-unit.target: 提供 API 來建構<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref>s，叫用相關的空間標準的 EDM 函式，並在適當時，允許的應用程式開發介面以運算式類型本身的擴充方法來存取。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'Area' function with the specified argument, which must have an Edm.Geography or Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用標準 '區域' 函式，以指定的引數，必須有 Edm.Geography 或 Edm.Geometry 結果類型。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the expression is Edm.Double.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的結果型別是 Edm.Double。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the spatial surface value for which the area should be calculated.
trans-unit.target: 指定計算區域中的空間介面值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns either the area of spatialValue or if spatialValue is not a surface.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回的區域 spatialValue 或如果 spatialValue 不是介面。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'AsBinary' function with the specified argument, which must have an Edm.Geography or Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用標準 'AsBinary' 函式，以指定的引數，必須具有 Edm.Geography 或 Edm.Geometry 的結果類型。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the expression is Edm.Binary.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的結果型別是 Edm.Binary。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the spatial value from which the well known binary representation should be produced.
trans-unit.target: 運算式，指定應該從中產生的已知的二進位表示法的空間值。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns the well known binary representation of spatialValue.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回已知的二進位表示法的 spatialValue 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'AsGml' function with the specified argument, which must have an Edm.Geography or Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用標準 'AsGml' 函式，以指定的引數，必須有 Edm.Geography 或 Edm.Geometry 結果類型。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the expression is Edm.String.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的結果類型為 Edm.String。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the spatial value from which the Geography Markup Language (GML) representation should be produced.
trans-unit.target: 運算式，指定應該從中產生的地理標記語言 (GML) 表示法的空間值。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns the Geography Markup Language (GML) representation of spatialValue.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回的地理標記語言 (GML) 表示 spatialValue 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'AsText' function with the specified argument, which must have an Edm.Geography or Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用標準 'AsText' 函式，以指定的引數，必須有 Edm.Geography 或 Edm.Geometry 結果類型。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the expression is Edm.String.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的結果類型為 Edm.String。

trans-unit.target: 運算式，指定應該從中產生的已知的文字表示的空間值。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns the well known text representation of spatialValue.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回的已知的文字表示法 spatialValue 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'Centroid' function with the specified argument, which must have an Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用標準 '距心' 函式，以指定的引數，必須有 Edm.Geometry 結果類型。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the expression is Edm.Geometry.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的結果型別是 Edm.Geometry。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the geometry surface value from which the centroid should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 指定應該從中擷取距心的幾何表層值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns either the centroid point of geometryValue (which may not be on the surface itself) or if geometryValue is not a surface.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回的任一個的距心點 geometryValue （可能不會在介面本身上） 或如果 geometryValue 不是介面。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'CoordinateSystemId' function with the specified argument, which must have an Edm.Geography or Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用標準 'CoordinateSystemId' 函式，以指定的引數，必須有 Edm.Geography 或 Edm.Geometry 結果類型。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the expression is Edm.Int32.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的結果類型為 Edm.Int32。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the value from which the coordinate system id (SRID) should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 指定應該從中擷取座標系統識別碼 (SRID) 值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns the integer SRID value from spatialValue.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回整數的 SRID 值 spatialValue 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'Distance' function with the specified arguments, which must each have an Edm.Geography or Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用指定的引數，每個 Edm.Geography 或 Edm.Geometry 結果類型必須與標準的 'Distance' 函式。

trans-unit.source: The result type of spatialValue1 must match the result type of spatialValue2.
trans-unit.target: 結果型別 spatialValue1 必須符合的結果型別 spatialValue2 。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the expression is Edm.Double.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的結果型別是 Edm.Double。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the first spatial value.
trans-unit.target: 指定空間的第一個值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the spatial value from which the distance from `spatialValue1` should be measured.
trans-unit.target: 指定的空間值之間的距離的運算式`spatialValue1`應該測量。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns the distance between the closest points in spatialValue1 and spatialValue1.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回中最接近的點之間的距離 spatialValue1 和 spatialValue1 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'Elevation' function with the specified argument, which must have an Edm.Geography or Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用標準 '提升權限' 函式，以指定的引數，必須具有 Edm.Geography 或 Edm.Geometry 的結果類型。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the expression is Edm.Double.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的結果型別是 Edm.Double。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the spatial point value from which the elevation (Z co-ordinate) value should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 指定應該從中擷取的提高權限 （Z 共同縱座標） 值的空間點值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns either the elevation value of spatialValue or if spatialValue is not a point.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回提高權限的值，或是 spatialValue 或如果 spatialValue 不是點。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'EndPoint' function with the specified argument, which must have an Edm.Geography or Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用標準 'EndPoint' 函式，使用指定的引數，必須有 Edm.Geography 或 Edm.Geometry 結果類型。

trans-unit.source: The result type is the same as that of spatialValue.
trans-unit.target: 結果型別是屬於相同 spatialValue 。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the spatial curve value from which the end point should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 指定應該從中擷取結束點的空間曲線值的運算式。

trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用標準 'SpatialTypeName' 函式，以指定的引數，必須有 Edm.Geography 或 Edm.Geometry 結果類型。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the expression is Edm.String.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的結果類型為 Edm.String。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the value from which the Geometry Type name should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 運算式，指定應該從中擷取 Geometry 類型名稱的值。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns the string Geometry Type name from spatialValue.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回從字串 Geometry 類型名稱 spatialValue 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'SpatialUnion' function with the specified arguments, which must each have an Edm.Geography or Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用指定的引數，每個 Edm.Geography 或 Edm.Geometry 結果類型必須與標準的 'SpatialUnion' 函式。

trans-unit.source: The result type of spatialValue1 must match the result type of spatialValue2.
trans-unit.target: 結果型別 spatialValue1 必須符合的結果型別 spatialValue2 。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the expression is the same as the type of spatialValue1 and spatialValue2.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的結果型別是相同的型別 spatialValue1 和 spatialValue2 。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the first spatial value.
trans-unit.target: 指定空間的第一個值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the spatial value for which the union with `spatialValue1` should be computed.
trans-unit.target: 運算式，指定空間值，其與 union`spatialValue1`應該計算。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns the spatial value representing the union of spatialValue1 and spatialValue2.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回代表的聯集的空間值 spatialValue1 和 spatialValue2 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'SpatialWithin' function with the specified arguments, which must each have an Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用指定的引數，每個 Edm.Geometry 結果類型必須與標準的 'SpatialWithin' 函式。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the expression is Edm.Boolean.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的結果型別是 Edm.Boolean。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the first geometry value.
trans-unit.target: 運算式，指定第一個幾何的值。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the geometry value that should be compared with `geometryValue1`.
trans-unit.target: 運算式，指定要與比較的幾何值`geometryValue1`。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns a Boolean value indicating whether geometryValue1 is spatially within geometryValue2.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回布林值，指出是否 geometryValue1 在空間上是 geometryValue2 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'StartPoint' function with the specified argument, which must have an Edm.Geography or Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用標準 'StartPoint' 函式，使用指定的引數，必須有 Edm.Geography 或 Edm.Geometry 結果類型。

trans-unit.source: The result type is the same as that of spatialValue.
trans-unit.target: 結果型別是屬於相同 spatialValue 。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the spatial curve value from which the start point should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 應該擷取指定的開始點的空間曲線值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns either the start point of spatialValue or if spatialValue is not a curve.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回的任一個的開始點 spatialValue 或如果 spatialValue 不曲線。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'XCoordinate' function with the specified argument, which must have an Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用標準 'XCoordinate' 函式，以指定的引數，必須有非 Edm.Geometry 的結果類型。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the expression is Edm.Double.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的結果型別是 Edm.Double。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the geometry point value from which the X co-ordinate value should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 指定應該從中擷取 X 共同縱座標值的幾何點值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns either the X co-ordinate value of geometryValue or if geometryValue is not a point.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回 X 共同縱座標的值，或是 geometryValue 或如果 geometryValue 不是點。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref> that invokes the canonical 'YCoordinate' function with the specified argument, which must have an Edm.Geometry result type.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionExpression"></xref>會叫用標準 'YCoordinate' 函式，以指定的引數，必須有 Edm.Geometry 結果類型。

trans-unit.source: The result type of the expression is Edm.Double.
trans-unit.target: 運算式的結果型別是 Edm.Double。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the geometry point value from which the Y co-ordinate value should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 指定應該從中擷取 Y 共同縱座標值的幾何點值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: A new DbFunctionExpression that returns either the Y co-ordinate value of geometryValue or if geometryValue is not a point.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbFunctionExpression，傳回 Y 共同縱座標的值，或是 geometryValue 或如果 geometryValue 不是點。
